p: We also evaluated weight loss after viral challenge. Notably, the weight loss rates of the p-tPA-p3M2e and p-p3M2e immunized groups were lower than that of the control group, but the difference was not significant ( p > 0.05). The surviving mice in both DNA vaccination groups recovered after a slight loss of body weight, whereas mice in the control groups died within 11 days post-infection and had body weight losses of over 25% ( Figure 4(C), (F), (I)).
